title: Changelog
short_description: A simple changelog template. Currently used to share personal updates, improvements, and notes.

title: Shafa
short_description: A wardrobe logging, composition, and organization app

title: m8
short_description: A media upload, organization, and display tool leveraging Cloudflare Workers

title: Exploding Chickens
short_description: A beautiful, online alternative to the popular Exploding Kittens card game
long_description: A beautiful, online alternative to the popular Exploding Kittens card game. Built on Node.js with 1,750+ games played by 600+ players, led development and a team of 5.

bullets.text: A full-stack online card game built using Node.js with 1,750+ games played by 600+ players; led development and a team of 5
Delivered 4 guest lectures at University of Illinois Chicago and SpaceX detailing project structure, schema, testing, viewed by 200+

title: Steven Olikara Website
short_description: A foundational website supporting Steven Olikara's run for the U.S. Senate in Wisconsin
long_description: A foundational website supporting Steven Olikara's 2022 run for the U.S. Senate in Wisconsin. Completely rebuilt from the ground up with unified colors, textures, and mobile optimizations.

title: Author
short_description: A centralized user management backbone
long_description: A centralized user management backbone. Author provides a consistent user experience among all of Radison's web services.

bullets.text: A centralized user management backbone leveraging edge cloud compute, built using Cloudflare Workers, Nuxt, Auth0
Saved and managed 100's of user profiles; API distributed for use across 10+ external services to keep profiles up-to-date

title: Informr
short_description: A web form submission intermediary leveraging edge cloud compute
long_description: A no-nonsense web form endpoint that enables web developers to handle form submissions faster. Leverages edge compute to offer high request volume and low cost.

bullets.text: A web form submission backbone leveraging edge cloud compute, built using Cloudflare Workers, Nuxt
Saved and analyzed 1,000's of form submissions at the cloud edge, filters spam and sends email notifications via Mailgun

title: Vibhav Bansal Website
short_description: A razor-sharp business portfolio website for a nationwide leader in Neuroscience

title: Pulqra Website
short_description: A minimalist website showcasing Pulqra's vision, product, and collaborations worldwide

title: RRATFR Manager
short_description: An effort to streamline the organizational efforts of the Rock River Anything That Floats Race
long_description: An effort to streamline the organizational efforts of the Rock River Anything That Floats Race. Running on Node.js, this project displays a powerful web interface where administrators can manage raft information, conduct raft timing, and display results to the public. A smart timing plugin and a custom web voting limiter for the People's Choice Award were both built from scratch.

title: RAkerman Status
short_description: A global fallback web server and status monitor designed to be deployed at scale
long_description: A fallback web server and status monitor for all RAkerman-related services. RAkerman Status is built of top of a couple state-of-the-art technologies (Nuxt 3, Cloudflare Workers) that allow it to be deployed on a global scale. And oh yeah, whenever a service comes offline it sends an email alert to all technical subscribers. Pretty cool right?

title: ImpackAI
short_description: An inventory management and purchase order platform built for small packaging warehouses
long_description: An inventory management platform unlike any other. ImpackAI puts analytics at the center of your workflow all while keeping a simple and intuitive interface. Keep track of inventory with varying amounts of stock at different stages in the production process. Help employees work more efficiently with an advanced metrics system. Predict purchase orders in the future. All in just a couple clicks.

title: Homebase
short_description: A localized, custom-built home automation platform leveraging IoT devices
long_description: A personal take on home automation. Homebase is a set of home controllers designed to monitor and manage literally anything. Homebase SPKR is a fully-inclusive smart sprinkler system controller. Just specify what zones you want watered and when, and SPKR will do the rest. Homebase GARA watches over the garage with a few neat tricks. GARA can automatically close all open garage doors and turn the lights on and off whenever you open a door. Homebase MNTR receives the wired input of any door sensors in your home and notifies you if it detects a breach. All built from scratch, by myself.

title: Passport UIC Shibboleth
short_description: A npm package that integrates Shibboleth's SAML SSO with Node.js Express web apps
long_description: A Nodejs-Express-Passport authentication strategy that works with the University of Illinois Chicago's Shibboleth single-sign on service. Extends the passport-saml npm module, but sets all the default options so that it works with the UIC Shibboleth Identity Provider (IdP). Built out an entire sample project using Vite, Vue 3, and Tailwind along with a "Shibalike" emulator for local testing. Wrote extensive documentation and recorded a walkthrough video for others to understand how to use passport-uicshib.

title: RAkerman Linker
short_description: A simple url shortener that can be deployed in a pinch on Cloudflare Workers + KV
long_description: A simple url shortener that can be deployed over multiple domains simultaneously. RAkerman Linker leverages the power of Nuxt 3 and Cloudflare Workers KV to handle a unified list of custom redirects on a global scale. Specify a shortened url along with a target url in the Cloudflare Workers KV interface, and this service will handle the rest.

title: Particlecord
short_description: A Particle.io events recognition filter (specifically for Tracker One) that pushes select updates to the Discord API
long_description: Particlecord listens to the data stream from Particle.io devices and notifies the user when a particular event occurs. Think of Particlecord as an "API middleman" that filters a real-time data stream from Particle.io and sends smart push notifications through Discord. Devices can also be managed using the Discord bot by setting friendly names, changing alert frequencies, and outputting the status of any device.

title: Remindcord
short_description: A dead-simple, custom Discord bot that sends messages on a defined interval

title: PaperMC Manager
short_description: A bash script that can manage multiple active papermc instances on Linux using screen and pm2

title: Particle Pace Clock
short_description: A pair of meshed swim pace clocks built using neopixel segments and Particle.io microcontrollers
long_description: Have you ever had to deal with 2 overpriced and outdated pace clocks breaking for seemingly no reason during swim practice in high school? Well, I did. (drumroll sounds) Introducing the Particle Pace Clock, a state-of-the-art, multi-color, over-engineered digital clock system designed for pacing swim practices. This clock is essentially a strip of RGB leds (Neopixels) connected to a microcontroller (Particle Argon) that displays the time from 00:00 to 59:59 (mm:ss) over and over (in any color you'd like). It probably doesn't sound that cool, but trust me, it is a far cry from what it used to be.

title: Mark 4
short_description: A fourth attempt at Radison Akerman's personal website. Notes of programming, cleanliness, and unification

bullets.text: Radison Akerman's 4th personal portfolio website, built as a lightweight frontend using Nuxt, Cloudflare Workers, Tailwind
Hosts a Resume/CV export tool that converts JSON-ified experience data to styled HTML/CSS to PDF using Puppeteer, Github Actions

title: Mark 3
short_description: A third attempt at Radison Akerman's personal website. Notes of blog, professionalism, and classic web design

title: Mark 2
short_description: A second attempt at Radison Akerman's personal website. Notes of photography, one-pagers, and info-dumpage

title: Mark 1
short_description: The first attempt at Radison Akerman's personal website. Notes of 'lil Rad, programming, and paid website templates
